duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide engineering support for electrification projects and act as a technical liaison between Engineering and customers.
Understand and represent customer needs and be the voice of the customer in product development roadmap.
Coordinate activities to evaluate and resolve engineering-related customer issues and manage engineering deviations and database.
Collaborate with internal teams to shape and manage product/system content growth and continuous improvement.
Support product documentation for the customer and ensure product meets customer requirements.
Interpret installation drawings, investigate defective products, and formulate corrective action plans.
Maintain records and present technical communication, including professional presentations to customers.
Coordinate the company's product testing & launch support activities at customer site.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Mechanical/Electrical/Mechatronic Engineering from an accredited university
